nodes.text: Chav wine was a type of wine. The Galactic Empire considered it to be contraband. The ZeHethbra smuggler Clyngunn once smuggled a shipment of chav wine when he was intercepted by a customs boarding party. The customs official in command was an amateur athlete and recognized Clyngunn, who was a famed athlete holding the record for most sentients defeated in his class of the Multi-Sentient Unarmed Combat Rounds at the Stratis Games. In exchange for Clyngunn's autograph, the official overlooked the infraction.
